title: Enhancing extraction efficiency of carpaine in Carica papaya L. leaves: coupling acid-base extraction with surfactant-assisted micro-flotation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28768-28778
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05132G, Paper

Thien Quang Lam, Anh Thi Quynh Tran, Thu Le Anh Phan, Florian Zitzmann, Nam Van Ho Phan, Khoi Tan Nguyen
Carpaine, a major alkaloid in papaya leaves, has considerable cardiovascular benefits alongside its notable effects on muscle relaxation when utilized in medicine.
